# Examples Fixtures

**Parent:** `../AGENTS.md`

Test fixtures demonstrating various Pynguin features and use cases.

## Overview
Collection of example Python modules used to validate Pynguin's test generation capabilities across different programming patterns and scenarios.

## Purpose
These fixtures serve as integration test cases showing how Pynguin handles:
- Different class hierarchies and method patterns
- Various function signatures and parameter types
- Real-world code structures and idioms
- Edge cases in test generation

## Parent Documentation
See ../AGENTS.md for fixture category overview.
